posts.title: Insecureshop - Hardcoded Credentials
posts.summary: Identify username and password that is hardcoded in the app

posts.title: InsecureShop - Insufficient URL Validation
posts.summary: Possible to load any arbitrary URL in webview via Deeplink

posts.title: RedLineStealer Information Stealer Analysis
posts.summary: Redline malware is an Information Stealer written in c# , targeting windows victims. It is used for gathering victims information ranging from cookies, credentials, Discord tokens

posts.title: RemcosRat infection chain from excel with Macros
posts.summary: RemcosRAT is a Fileless multi-stage malware that is distributed through malicious macros in Excel files.

posts.title: Return-Oriented Programming - Callme
posts.summary: Reliably make consecutive calls to imported functions. Use some new techniques and learn about the Procedure Linkage Table.

posts.title: Return-Oriented Programming - Ret2csu
posts.summary: Learn a ROP technique that lets you populate useful calling convention registers like rdi, rsi and rdx even in an environment where gadgets are sparse.

posts.title: Return-Oriented Programming - ret2win
posts.summary: ret2win means return here to win and it's recommended you start with this challenge. Visit the challenge page by clicking this card to learn more.

posts.title: Return-Oriented Programming - Split
posts.summary: Combine elements from the ret2win challenge that have been split apart to beat this challenge. Learn how to use another tool whilst crafting a short ROP chain.

posts.title: Return-Oriented Programming - Write4
posts.summary: Find and manipulate gadgets to construct an arbitrary write primitive, then use it to learn where and how to get your data into process memory.

posts.title: Static Analysis of Malware Strings
posts.summary: Strings challenges contains an un-encrypted flag stored within the executable. When run, the program will output an MD5 hash of the flag but not the original. Can you extract the flag?

posts.title: Reversing 8-bit Bytecode Virtual Machine
posts.summary: Can you figure out how the VM works and write your own to decrypt the flag?

posts.title: Android Application Security Series - Part2
posts.summary: Firebase, Local Sqlite and AWS storage security weaknesses.

posts.title: Android Application Security Series- Part 1
posts.summary: Intents, Exported Activity, Resources and Weak Cryptographic Algorithms
